versionInfo.fileDescription: tinyMediaManager is a media management tool written in Java/Swing. It is written to provide metadata for Kodi (XBMC).

messages.startupErr: An error occurred while starting the application.
messages.bundledJreErr: This application was configured to use a bundled Java Runtime Environment but the runtime is missing or corrupted.
messages.jreVersionErr: This application requires a Java Runtime Environment 1.6 or higher
messages.launcherErr: The registry refers to a nonexistent Java Runtime Environment installation or the runtime is corrupted.
messages.instanceAlreadyExistsMsg: An application instance is already running.
